Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - PCI DSS (v2.11)
Question: PCID-01: Do your systems or products store, process, or transmit cardholder (payment/credit/debt card) data?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - PCI DSS (v2.11)
Question: PCID-02: Are you compliant with the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS)?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - PCI DSS (v2.11)
Question: PCID-03: Do you have a current, executed within the past year, Attestation of Compliance (AoC) or Report on Compliance (RoC)?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - PCI DSS (v2.11)
Question: PCID-04: Are you classified as a service provider?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - PCI DSS (v2.11)
Question: PCID-05: Are you on the list of VISA approved service providers?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - PCI DSS (v2.11)
Question: PCID-06: Are you classified as a merchant?  If so, what level (1, 2, 3, 4)?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - PCI DSS (v2.11)
Question: PCID-07: Describe the architecture employed by the system to verify and authorize credit card transactions.

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - PCI DSS (v2.11)
Question: PCID-08: What payment processors/gateways does the system support?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - PCI DSS (v2.11)
Question: PCID-09: Can the application be installed in a PCI DSS compliant manner ?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - PCI DSS (v2.11)
Question: PCID-10: Is the application listed as an approved PA-DSS application?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - PCI DSS (v2.11)
Question: PCID-11: Does the system or products use a third party to collect, store, process, or transmit cardholder (payment/credit/debt card) data?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - PCI DSS (v2.11)
Question: PCID-12: Include documentation describing the systems' abilities to comply with the PCI DSS and any features or capabilities of the system that must be added or changed in order to operate in compliance with the standards.
